idea-plugin.name: Taiga.io Tasks
idea-plugin.description: Enable the use of taiga.io as an IntelliJ task server.
idea-plugin.change-notes:
1.1.2 - Uncommented the modules.lang dependency to enable all products

1.1.1 - Switched build JDK to java 1.6 in order to support a wider range of environments

1.1.0 - Added the ability to filter tasks shown by those only assigned to you

1.0.2 - Switched to using getResponseBodyAsStream rather than string to avoid potential issues on large responses from the server

1.0.1 - Fixed issue with server not persisting project reload

1.0.0 - Initial Release
